sub_title: Founder of Localie — a single app to make every trip special ❤️
summary: Ukraine-raised and Netherlands-based global tech entrepreneur, an alumni of the Dutch Startup Visa Program (2020). Since 2019, Nick is working as a full-time CEO at Localie — a single app to make every trip special ❤️ Localie has generated almost $1M in sales, actively growing now on the US, UK and Canada consumer markets. Nick has raised over $300K in pre-seed money from world leading VC institutions, based in Silicon Valley — like Unpopular VC — recently ranked the #3 most resilient venture capital firm after YC and Sequoia Capital, based on an analysis of AngelList data.

education.field_of_study: Computer/Information Technologies, Software & Process Development, IT Administration and Management

projects.title: Smart Parking system country standard definition for IKEA in Russia

Steered results through top management committees to get an approval for further investment. Brought extra business benefit to the system.

publications.name: Eindhoven Business Update: The Story of Localie

authors.headline: Founder of Localie — a single app to make every trip special ❤️

profile_positions.description:
At Localie we're building that one single app to make your entire trip special ❤️ Our secret sauce is the exclusive knowledge of hundreds of verified locals living all over the world.

With Localie you can:

✨ Get inspired where to travel next for an unforgettable experience
✨ Get a local's hint on accommodation, best in terms of value for money, and travel tips
✨ Hire your local friend who matches your interests, meets you at the airport and shows you around
✨ Book and pay for everything securely with a single button

All built as a simple chat, powered by AI, real humans and our exclusive knowledge base built and maintained by verified locals.

A few achievements to celebrate since 2019:
👉 survived COVID pandemic — the worst crisis for international travel
👉 generated almost $1M in sales
👉 raised over $300K in venture capital from world leading investors like Unpopular VC, the world #3 most resilient VC firm based on analysis of AngelList data
👉 built a fully functioning web version and iOS app
👉 built a powerful analytical system that helps to improve our product and tracks all key metrics; our recent wins: the visitor-to-lead conversion is up to 12% from 3%, while the lead-to-payment conversion hit 70% for one of the customers' segments
profile_positions.title: CEO, Founder

profile_positions.description:
Leading global IT projects and sub-projects for various locations:

ONE IIG - O365 Migration and setting up the one IT environment for all Inter IKEA Group companies. Responsible for establishing IT services and support organization within involved companies and branches - IKEA Industry, Inter IKEA Systems, Range & Supply group (20 countries in total).

Store Fulfillment Project - Leading IT component for high-prio management strategic initiative to transfer stores into 2-in-1 customers fulfillment center, piloting in Delft, Netherlands. Focus on IT infrastructure and in-store logistics business solutions.
profile_positions.title: IT Project Lead

profile_positions.description:
Coordinating and managing medium and large commercial projects (total cost over $30 mln) for MEGA shopping centres - the largest shopping centres chain in Russia with 14 malls operated by IKEA. Located countrywide from St.Petersburg to Novosibirsk, they have over 2 mln sq m retail space, 275 million visitors annually, 135,000 people employed at the shopping centres. 

Major projects:

• Customer Care Project
Redevelopment of one of the leading shopping centres in St.Petersburg, Russia, aiming to create a meeting place of the future. Concentrated on commercial part: customer needs, hospitality, market trends analysis, ROI evaluation. Coordinated concept development by a well-known French architectural company and its further implementation.

• Smart Parking system country standard definition
Being a part of the experts group, represented Business IT component. Performed an intensive research of the world leading smart parking systems. Steered results through top management committees to get an approval for further investment. Brought extra business benefit to the system.
profile_positions.title: Commercial Projects Coordinator

profile_positions.description:
Countrywide and international IT projects related to the new systems implementation, investigating new technologies. Support multiple legal entities of IKEA Group in Russia: MEGA shopping centers, IKEA stores, industry, supply and trading groups.

Major projects:

• One IKEA Russia TV Launch
Created and implemented the new way of corporate communication for over 50 IKEA offices and stores in Russia, Belarus and Ukraine. Led the process from solution definition stage to exact technology implementation, content strategy alignment and launch.

• Unification of IT architecture in the shopping malls
Coordinated design principles development for IT infrastructure for 14 shopping centres belonged to IKEA in Russia from Novosibirsk to St.Petersburg. Made it to meet the latest business and technology requirements (server room and related engineering systems, structured cable network, LAN/WLAN infrastructure, CCTV organization).
profile_positions.title: IT Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
Supported multinational project team with meetings facilitation, information gathering and analysis, coordination of the workload and reporting . Actively used PMP techniques.

Major projects:

• Automation Manufacture Suppliers Connectivity (vehicles assembly)
Significantly decreased the time of spare parts delivery to conveyor and enhance efficiency of the vehicles assembly process by providing an integration between plant production systems and supplier’s ERP.

• ITIL Processes in Electronic Docflow System Launch
Analysed business processes to identify those possible to automate in accordance to ITIL security regulations.

• Production systems launch for start assembling the new Mondeo
Renovation of the conveyor to support the new SYNC computer installation to the assembled vehicle  and its further automated provisioning.

• Mid-size projects
New technologies and business IT processes implementation, existing systems or infrastructure adjustments
profile_positions.title: IT Project Management Analyst

profile_positions.description:
Key responsibilities:

• Designating and enhancing IT function processes to obtain a full compliance with ISO and Ford internal standards related to information security and confidence. Documenting processes according to ISO requirements (procedures and instructions preparations) in both languages English and Russian, concurring documents with senior management from all plant departments.

• Collaborating with numerous plant departments and business functions to accumulate their needs and deliver a proper solution able to satisfy all parties.

• Managing several projects impacting St.Petersburg BIT, security and controls (starting from solution definition finishing by business systems amendments, management and users trainings and distributing appropriate documentation).

• Support the preparation phase and handling the General Audit of IT function.

• Organizing strong cooperation of IT function with other departments regarding numerous projects and questions, preparing presentation and presenting them, leading the meetings.

• Meeting minutes preparation, collaborating and coordinating with different internal and international teams on the way to implement the project.
profile_positions.title: IT Security Analyst
